page.title: 10Home Life My Family
page.content: {David}There are four people in my family.My Mam,my Dad,my brother and me.We have a dog called Teal.It is labrador.It will be two in November. My Mam's hobby is knitting.She has knitted two jumpers.My Mam works at the pit canteen.I think she likes it there.When the car is broken my Dad fixes it.When my Mam goes to work in the morning my Dad says,"I am always left with all the work,aren't I David? and I say,"Well that is too bad, isn't it." Sometimes he says,"Soon I will have to go to work." When the cartoons are on in the afternoon my Dad says,"These programmes are for babies." I say, "Well I just like them," and Paul my brother says the same as me.
